import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './CartProduct.scss'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ProductsContext } from '../../ProductsProvider'; import { PropTypes } from 'prop-types'; export const CartProduct = ({ images, name, price, capacity, id}) => { const { favorites, setFavorites, carts, setCarts, changeHistory } = useContext(ProductsContext); return (
changeHistory('model', "Apple iPhone 12 64GB Red (MGJ73)")} >

{name}

{`${price[0]}$`}
{price[1] ? `${price[1]}$` : ''}
{}

Screen

6.5” OLED

Capacity

{capacity}

RAM

4 GB

{!carts.includes(id) ? ( ) : ( )} {!favorites.includes(id) ? ( ) : ( )}
); } CartProduct.propTypes = { images: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.string.isRequired, ).isRequired, name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, price: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.number.isRequired).isRequired, capacity: PropTypes.string.isRequired, id: PropTypes.number.isRequired, };
